hooks.prompt: A new file was just created. Consider running a quick AI Council security check if this file contains code (not documentation). Use /council-trivial for a fast 30-second security and duplication review.
Code was just modified. If this was a significant change (>50 lines or security-sensitive), consider running /council to ensure quality and security standards are met.

Before committing, consider running AI Council review on your changes:
- /council-trivial for small changes (<100 LOC)
- /council-feature for new features (100-500 LOC)
- /council-architectural for major refactoring (>500 LOC)

This helps catch issues before they're committed.
